articles.author: Maite Fernández Simon
articles.title: African and South Asian citizens fleeing Ukraine denounce racism - The Washington Post
articles.description: Several African, South Asian and Middle Eastern citizens in Ukraine have denounced instances of racism while trying to flee the shelling in the country.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Dinosaur fossil discovery may be the oldest stegosaur ever found - CNN
articles.description: The fossil of an armored dinosaur that lived 168 million years ago is the oldest stegosaur found in Asia and may belong to one of the earliest stegosaurs. The fossil showcases a "really weird mix of features" that shed light on stegosaur evolution.
